text: %Arabica offers a sleek, minimalist space perfect for coffee lovers. The Kyoto Latte stands out—smooth, rich, and beautifully crafted. Though pricey, the quality and ambiance justify the splurge. Ideal for those who appreciate well-balanced coffee in a calm, aesthetic setting. A must-try for design and caffeine enthusiasts alike.

came in 3mins before opening and the lady curtly told me they aren't open yet as though to say i can only step in the store exactly at 1030. had to tell her i know that it's another 3mins before they open.

unnecessarily abrasive.

also strange opening hours for a coffee place. 1030AM misses a lot of the morning crowd and usually not a lot of people drink coffee after 5PM. granted they do sell soft-serve.

coffee is quite expensive but tastes nice.
Fantastic speciality coffee offerings here as with all their branches. Nice looking store but lacking any form of seating so it's buy and go.
Simple and good. Can only order ‘to go’ as there’s no dining area. Will get a cup from here when the queue is not too long :) I like that they have unsweetened matcha latte here.
Had a black coffee and matcha ice cream at MBS Arabica. The matcha ice cream was a pleasant surprise—smooth, flavorful, and a solid dessert choice at MBS.
